# GraphQL API

This is the LLM-optimized documentation for the GraphQL API GraphQL API.
For human-readable documentation, visit: http://localhost:3000

## Docs

- [API Overview](http://localhost:3000/llm-docs/index.md): Quick reference with all operation signatures - createUser, updateProfile, addAddress, me, user, users, category, categories, â€¦
- [User Management](http://localhost:3000/llm-docs/user-management.md) - createUser, updateProfile, addAddress, me, user, users
- [Product Catalog](http://localhost:3000/llm-docs/product-catalog.md) - category, categories, createProduct, updateProduct, deleteProduct, product, products, search
- [Orders & Checkout](http://localhost:3000/llm-docs/orders-checkout.md) - cart, addToCart, updateCartItem, removeFromCart, placeOrder, order, myOrders, orderStatusChanged
- [Reviews & Ratings](http://localhost:3000/llm-docs/reviews-ratings.md) - review, createReview, markReviewHelpful
- [Notifications](http://localhost:3000/llm-docs/notifications.md) - notificationReceived
